com.shlomi.golemland.game.GameContainers

Class GameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.shlomi.golemland.game.GameContainers.GameActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDirection, Settings

    public class GameActivity
extends Activity
implements Settings, IDirection
    Game activity handles all touch events and is the container of the game.
    It initializes the game components.
    Author:
    Shlomi
